content: Is anyone working on porting this module? https://www.drupal.org/project/imce_filefield . I'm thinking about for use with image and file fields.

@Elisabeth Garbeil, there's this: https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/imce

backdrop-contrib/imce
Backdrop port of Drupal 7 module. Image/file uploader and browser - backdrop-contrib/imce
Oh, oops, I thought you were asking about the main IMCE module. I must have stopped reading at that point. :confused:

@oadaeh, I know. Thatâ€™s the base module. This was a separate module allowing IMCE to work with another field type.

Warmest regards,

Elisabeth Garbeil, MBA PMP
